forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 47F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
